publication.title: Simulated Micro-, Lunar, and Martian Gravities on Earth—Effects on Escherichia coli Growth, Phenotype, and Sensitivity to Antibiotics

results.effect: increased growth under simulated micro- and lunar gravities for some strains
cell diameter and length and aggregation
higher concentrations of antibiotics needed under simulated lunar gravity with respect to simulated micro- and Martian gravities
